roleset.name: to make or make appear historical

example.name: Passive, arg1 only
example.text: Why not watch or hear your experience historicized while you were living it ?

example.name: All args
example.text: What I set out to do in those posts was historicize the doomsters.

roleset.note: HISTORICIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. (from historicize.01-v)
